commits.content:
{
  "name": "speakwell-admin",
  "private": true,
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "type": "module",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "node server.ts",
    "build": "tsc && vite build",
    "lint": "eslint . --ext ts,tsx --report-unused-disable-directives --max-warnings 0",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "test": "vitest",
    "db:dump": "supabase db dump -f src/db/schema.sql",
    "db:pull": "supabase db pull",

    "db:push": "supabase db push",
    "supabase:start": "supabase start",
    "supabase:stop": "supabase stop",
    "backup-schema": "node scripts/backup-schema.js"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@ckeditor/ckeditor5-build-classic": "^44.1.0",

    "@hookform/resolvers": "^3.10.0",
    "@next/font": "^14.2.15",
    "@phosphor-icons/react": "^2.1.7",
    "@prisma/client": "^6.3.0",
    "@radix-ui/react-accordion": "^1.2.2",

    "@radix-ui/react-avatar": "^1.1.2",
    "@radix-ui/react-collapsible": "^1.1.2",

    "@radix-ui/react-dropdown-menu": "^2.1.4",
    "@radix-ui/react-icons": "^1.3.2",
    "@radix-ui/react-label": "^2.1.1",
    "@radix-ui/react-popover": "^1.1.4",
    "@radix-ui/react-progress": "^1.1.1",
    "@radix-ui/react-scroll-area": "^1.2.2",
    "@radix-ui/react-select": "^2.1.4",
    "@radix-ui/react-separator": "^1.1.1",
    "@radix-ui/react-slot": "^1.1.1",
    "@radix-ui/react-tabs": "^1.1.2",
    "@radix-ui/react-toast": "^1.2.4",
    "@radix-ui/react-toggle": "^1.1.1",
    "@radix-ui/react-tooltip": "^1.1.6",
    "@react-google-maps/api": "^2.20.5",
    "@supabase/auth-helpers-nextjs": "^0.10.0",

    "@tiptap/extension-typography": "^2.11.3",
    "@tiptap/extension-underline": "^2.11.3",
    "@tiptap/pm": "^2.11.2",

    "npm": "^10.9.2",

    "prisma": "^6.3.0",

    "react-router-dom": "^7.1.1",
    "react-spinners": "^0.15.0",
    "recharts": "^2.15.0",
    "select": "^1.1.2",
    "set-value": "^4.1.0",
    "shadcn-ui": "^0.9.4",
    "shelljs": "^0.8.5",
    "skeleton": "^0.1.2",
    "sonner": "^1.7.1",
    "supabase-cli": "^0.0.21",
    "tailwind-merge": "^2.2.1",
    "tailwindcss-animate": "^1.0.7",
    "textarea": "^0.3.0",
    "toast": "^0.5.4",
    "tsx": "^4.19.2",

    "@tailwindcss/typography": "^0.5.16",

    "@types/babel__generator": "^7.6.8",
    "@types/cors": "^2.8.17",
    "@types/estree": "^1.0.6",
    "@types/express": "^5.0.0",
    "@types/lodash": "^4.17.13",
    "@types/node": "^20",
    "@types/pg": "^8.10.9",
    "@types/react": "^18",
    "@types/react-dom": "^18",
    "@types/react-grid-layout": "^1.3.5",
    "@types/react-query": "^1.2.8",
    "@types/react-router-dom": "^5.3.3",
    "@types/uuid": "^10.0.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^8.20.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^8.20.0",
    "@vitejs/plugin-react": "^4.3.4",
    "autoprefixer": "^10.0.1",
    "braces": "^3.0.3",
    "eslint": "^8",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.37.4",
    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^5.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react-refresh": "^0.4.18",
    "glob": "^11.0.1",
    "husky": "^9.1.7",
    "jest": "^29.7.0",
    "micromatch": "^4.0.8",
    "pg": "^8.11.3",
    "postcss": "^8",
    "prettier": "^3.4.2",
    "prettier-plugin-tailwindcss": "^0.6.9",
    "rimraf": "^6.0.1",
    "supabase": "^2.9.6",
    "tailwindcss": "^3.3.0",
    "ts-node": "^10.9.2",
    "typescript": "^5",
    "vite": "^5.0.0",
    "vite-express": "^0.20.0",
    "vite-plugin-express": "^1.0.3",
